casebody.data:
LINDBLADH CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. C. E. SHEPARD COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. No. 461. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. July 9, 1934. Stephen J. Cox, of New York City (Bertram G. Poster and Henry L. Poster, both of Washington, D. C., of counsel), for appellant. Charles Neave, of New York City (Harrison P. Lyman, Charles E. Hammett, Jr., and Pish, Richardson & Neave, all 'of Boston, Mass., of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (7 F. Supp. 446) affirmed.
